channel.title: Help! plz
channel.description:
Availible Commands: compile - Compiles your server. run - Runs your server using lawlscape. run2 - Runs your server the old way. runcompile - Simulates using run and compile runcompile2 - Simulates using run2 and compile exit - Exits out of the program.
[code] Option: compile client.java:19873: ';' expected stillgfx(331, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); ^ 1 error Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use? Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 200 at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:116) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:29) Press any key to continue . . . [/code] plz plz help i dont get that how i fix this ?? [code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 200 at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:116) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:29) [/code]

item.title: Help! plz
item.dc:creator: @zammy1 zammy!!
item.description:
@zammy1 wrote:

Availible Commands:
compile - Compiles your server.
run - Runs your server using lawlscape.
run2 - Runs your server the old way.
runcompile - Simulates using run and compile
runcompile2 - Simulates using run2 and compile
exit - Exits out of the program.

Option: compile
client.java:19873: ';' expected
stillgfx(331, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
^
1 error
Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use?
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 200
        at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:116)
        at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30)
        at server.main(server.java:29)
Press any key to continue . . .

plz plz help i dont get that
how i fix this ??

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 200
        at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:116)
        at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30)
        at server.main(server.java:29)

Read full topic
